title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and colorful mix of vegetables tossed in a savory soy-ginger sauce.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef served in crispy taco shells with fresh toppings.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with tomatoes, cucumber, olives, feta cheese, and oregano.
